args.policy_update: The latest policy update includes new regulations on margin trading and short selling

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'ASharePolicy.get_latest_policy', 'description': 'Get the latest policy updates related to A-share market.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'Type of policy update'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policy_update', 'description': 'The latest policy update details'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名金融分析师，想了解A股市场的政策影响。首先，我需要获取最新的政策动态。接着，分析这些政策对A股市场的影响。然后，比较不同行业的受影响程度。最后，提供一些基于政策动态的投资建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取最新的A股市场政策动态
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?
{'policy_update': 'The latest policy update includes new regulations on margin trading and short selling, which are expected to stabilize the market and reduce volatility.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'policy_update': 'The latest policy update includes new regulations on margin trading and short selling, which are expected to stabilize the market and reduce volatility.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析这些政策对A股市场的影响
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'policy_update'的值是什么?
The latest policy update includes new regulations on margin trading and short selling, which are expected to stabilize the market and reduce volatility.
{'impact_analysis': 'The new regulations are expected to reduce speculative trading, leading to a more stable market. However, they may also limit short-term gains for investors.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'impact_analysis': 'The new regulations are expected to reduce speculative trading, leading to a more stable market. However, they may also limit short-term gains for investors.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 比较不同行业的受影响程度。
